metadata.title: CVE-2019-16058 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the pam_p11 component 0.2.0 and 0.3.0 forOpenSC. If a smart card creates a signature with a length longer than 256bytes, this triggers a buffer overflow. This may be the case for RSA keyswith 4096 bits depending on the signature scheme.

criterions.comment: pam-p11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
